about_the_game:
RHYTHMIC combines the fast-paced VR rhythm-game genre with tactical tower defense. Collect magical particles in tune with epic music and skillfully unleash powerful spells upon invading enemies to defend the people whose only hope is your prowess!

Let the Music Infuse You

Choose from many different songs ranging from orchestral pieces over post-rock and metal tracks to magical musical tunes!

Gather Your Mana

Collect magical particles in tune with the music to charge up your magical powers!

Fend of Attackers

Unleash devastating spells onto your enemies to prevent them from destroying your gate while avoiding their own attacks!

Master the Magic!

Progress through the campaign or increase the difficulty in custom scenarios and climb the leaderboard to show your prowess for everyone to behold!

content_descriptors.notes:
Songs in the game can contain lyrics about violence or legal drug and alcohol consumption.
The general setting is a fight against evil forces.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX 480 8GB or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
